column1: https:/â€¦from the article "CHAFFEE WEIGHS LEGAL OPTIONS TO ENFORCE COVID-19 PROTECTIONSAs the situation with the coronavirus pandemic known as COVID-19 appears to be surging in 39 states across the country and cases rise in Colorado, Chaffee County has tough decisions ahead. They include how to continue to control the spread of the virus so as not to overwhelm our medical system, how to protect our economic future, and how to reopen schools."More information contained in the article.
